GMCM.ToggleHotkey.Desc: This is the toggle hotkey for Auto-Pickaxe.
GMCM.AutoSwitch.Desc: Automatically switches to the pickaxe when near minerals; the pickaxe must be in the toolbar.
GMCM.StopAutoSwitchAfterCombat.Desc: Time to Stop Auto-Switching After Combat (seconds)
GMCM.EffectOnMarkNodes.Desc: When the pickaxe is selected, right-click to mark nodes as targets for pickaxe.
GMCM.KeepMark.Desc: Marks will remain even when switching to other tools.
GMCM.EffectOnStoneOreNodes.Desc: Include all stone ore nodes as targets for destruction.
GMCM.EffectOnSpecialOreNodes.Desc: Include all special ore nodes as targets for destruction, such as gems and tool upgrade materials.
GMCM.EffectOnOtherModsResourceClumps.Des:
Include resource clumps from other mods as destruction targets. 
The first attempt must be manually collected by the player for the mod to learn whether the clump can be included in auto-collection.
This feature is currently in Beta.
Due to differences in data structures from various mods, proper functionality in all environments cannot be guaranteed.
If you encounter issues with this mod, please disable this feature.
GMCM.StopMiningWhenLadderDownCreate.Desc: In the mine, stop mining stone ores when a ladder or shaft to the next level appears.
GMCM.LadderDownSoundEffect.Desc: Plays a sound effect in the mine when a ladder or shaft to the next level appears.
GMCM.EffectOnMineRocks.Desc: Include Mine Rocks as a target for the pickaxe.
GMCM.EffectOnBoulder.Desc: Include boulder as a target for the pickaxe.
GMCM.EffectOnMeteor.Desc: Include meteor as a target for the pickaxe.
GMCM.EffectOnRockCrab.Desc: Include Rock Crab as a target for destruction.
GMCM.DisableOnFarm.Desc: Auto-Pickaxe will not operate on the farm.
GMCM.RetainStamina.Desc: When the remaining Stamina reaches this percentage, Auto-Pickaxe will stop.
GMCM.StaminaNotification.Desc: Display a notification when Stamina is low.
Notification.LowStamina: Auto-Pickaxe has temporarily stopped due to low Stamina.
GMCM.DetectCustomObjects.Desc:
You can install the Lookup Anything mod to query Item ID. 
Auto-Pickaxe will automatically target these objects. 
If you want to add multiple objects, please separate them with a comma.
GMCM.DetectCustomObjects.Hotkey.Desc: When enabled, you can also use Ctrl + Alt + right-click to add/remove detected custom objects.
GMCM.CustomRange.Desc: Set a custom range for the pickaxe's effect. If not toggled, a default value will be applied.
GMCM.Range.Desc: Defines the range for the automatic pickaxe swing.
GMCM.CustomEfficiency.Desc: Set a custom efficiency level for the pickaxe. If not toggled, a default value will be used.
GMCM.Efficiency.Desc: The number of stones destroyed with each pickaxe swing.
GMCM.MarkHotkey.Desc: Press to mark/unmark the nearest eligible tile.
DetectCustomObjects.Cancel: Detect custom objects - No object at this coordinate
